Question: What is AI?
Answer: AI stands for Artificial Intelligence.

Question: What is Python?
Answer: Python is a programming language.

Question: How can I register for a new course?
Answer: Go to Dashboard > Course Registration > Select the course and click Register.

Question: How do I log in to enroll in a course?
Answer: Click the Login/Sign-in button in the header at the top of the page > Enter your username and password > then submit to access the Courses page for enrollment.

Question: What if I forgot my password and can’t log in to enroll?
Answer: On the login screen > click “Forgot Password” to reset it > Follow the instructions or contact support if needed.

Question: As an admin how do I log in to manage course enrollments?
Answer: Use the Login>Signin button in the header > After logging in your Dashboard or Courses page will show enrollment management options.

Question: What if I get an error when logging in to enroll?
Answer: Double-check your username and password > If errors persist > try another browser or contact support.

Question: Can I enroll in a course without logging in?
Answer: No you must log in via the header to access enrollment features.

Question: How do I sign up as a new student to enroll in courses?
Answer: Click Login/Sign-in in the header > If a Sign Up option is available > fill in details like email and password > Admins may need an invite.

Question: What if the Login button isn’t working?
Answer: Refresh the page or clear your browser cache > If it persists > try a different device or contact support.

Question: Can I log in on my phone to enroll in courses?
Answer: Yes the header’s Login/Sign-in button is mobile-friendly > allowing access to enrollment features.

Question: As an admin is there a separate login for enrollment tasks?
Answer: No all users use the same header Login/Sign-in button > Your admin role unlocks enrollment management post-login.

Question: What if I need to switch accounts to enroll in a course?
Answer: Log out via the sidebar Logout link > then use the header Login/Sign-in button to log in with the correct account.

Question: What happens if I enter wrong login details multiple times?
Answer: You may be temporarily locked out for security > Wait a few minutes or reset your password via the login screen.

Question: Can I stay logged in to keep enrolling in courses?
Answer: If a “Remember Me” option exists on the login screen > check it > Otherwise > log in each time for security.

Question: How do I know if I’m logged in to enroll?
Answer: After logging in > you’ll see the sidebar with Courses and Dashboard options > indicating access to enrollment features.

Question: How do I find courses to enroll in from the Dashboard?
Answer: As a student > check the Courses section on the Dashboard > Click a course to view details and find the Enroll button.

Question: As an admin what enrollment tasks are on the Dashboard?
Answer: Your Dashboard shows pending enrollment submissions > Click to review > approve or reject them with a reason.

Question: What if no courses show on my Dashboard?
Answer: Go to the Courses page via the sidebar to browse all available courses and enroll.

Question: How do I see enrollment status updates on the Dashboard?
Answer: Check the Notifications section for alerts about enrollment approvals or rejections.

Question: As an admin how do I manage new enrollment requests?
Answer: Look for pending enrollment alerts on the Dashboard > click to view submissions and approve or reject them.

Question: What if my enrolled courses don’t appear on the Dashboard?
Answer: Ensure your enrollment was approved > Check the Courses page or Notifications for status.

Question: Can I start the enrollment process from the Dashboard?
Answer: Yes click a course in the Courses section to access its details and the Enroll button.

Question: As an admin what if I don’t see enrollment requests?
Answer: Check the Courses page for pending submissions or ensure students are submitting forms.

Question: How do I know if my enrollment was successful?
Answer: Look for a confirmation in the Notifications section on the Dashboard or check the Courses page.

Question: What if the Dashboard is slow to load enrollment data?
Answer: Clear notifications by marking them read or refresh the page > Contact support if it persists.

Question: As a student can I see enrollment announcements on the Dashboard?
Answer: Yes the Announcements section may include course-specific enrollment updates so Click to view details.

Question: As an admin how do I post enrollment updates on the Dashboard?
Answer: Create an announcement via the Announcements page and it’ll appear on students’ Dashboards if course-specific.

Question: What if I don’t see my enrollment notification?
Answer: Check the Notifications page or use the Chatbot to ask about your enrollment status.

Question: How do I find announcements about course enrollment?
Answer: Click Announcements in the sidebar then Use the course dropdown to filter for enrollment-related updates.

Question: As an admin how do I post an enrollment announcement?
Answer: On the Announcements page > click “Create New” (admin-only)and Add title and description > select the course and publish.

Question: What if I don’t see any enrollment announcements?
Answer: Use the search bar with keywords like “enroll” or “course” or check with the admin via Chatbot.

Question: How do I view enrollment details in an announcement?
Answer: Click View Details on an announcement and If it’s course-specific > View Course button links to enrollment options.

Question: As an admin how do I announce an enrollment deadline?
Answer: Create an announcement then select the course and include the deadline in the description.

Question: What if the course filter doesn’t show my enrolled course?
Answer: Confirm your enrollment on the Courses page and  If not enrolled> submit an enrollment form.

Question: How do I know if an announcement is about enrollment?
Answer: Check View Details> it’ll show “course-specific” for enrollment-related announcements.

Question: As an admin can I edit an enrollment announcement?
Answer: On the announcement’s details page > click Edit (admin-only) then update then save.

Question: What if the View Course button is missing?
Answer: It appears only for course-specific announcements not general ones unrelated to enrollment.

Question: As an admin how do I delete an old enrollment announcement?
Answer: On the announcement’s details page> click Delete (admin-only) and confirm.

Question: Can students ask questions about enrollment announcements?
Answer: No announcements are view-only > Use the Chatbot to ask the admin.

Question: What if I search for enrollment announcements and find none?
Answer: Try broader keywords or check if the admin has posted any > Use Chatbot to inquire.

Question: As an admin how do I ensure only enrolled students see announcements?
Answer: Select the specific course when creating the announcement to limit it to enrolled students.

Question: What happens after I submit an enrollment form?
Answer: The admin reviews your form > You’ll get a notification (Dashboard or Notifications) if approved or rejected.

Question: As an admin how do I review student enrollment submissions?
Answer: On the Courses page > find pending submissions then View details then approve or reject with a reason.

Question: What if my enrollment is rejected?
Answer: Check Notifications for the reason > Reapply via the Courses page or ask the admin via Chatbot.

Question: How do I see only my enrolled courses?
Answer: On the Courses page > use the filter to show only courses you’re enrolled in.

Question: What if no courses are available for enrollment?
Answer: Check Announcements for new course postings or ask the admin via Chatbot.

Question: As an admin how do I create a new course for enrollment?
Answer: On the Courses page > click “Create Course” (admin-only)> Add title > description and save.

Question: Can I enroll in multiple courses?
Answer: Yes submit separate enrollment forms for each course via the Courses page.

Question: What if the Enroll button isn’t on the course page?
Answer: You’re likely enrolled—look for a View Files button instead.

Question: As an admin how do I add files for enrolled students?
Answer: On the course’s details page > click Upload to add files > accessible to enrolled students via Files.

Question: What if my enrollment form fails to submit?
Answer: Ensure fields (name - student ID -reason) are complete so Try again or ask via Chatbot.

Question: Can I unenroll from a course?
Answer: Unenrollment isn’t supported directly so contact the admin via Chatbot to request it.

Question: As an admin how do I reject an enrollment with a reason?
Answer: On the submission > select Reject and enter a reason (e.g  “Incomplete form”) > The student is notified.

Question: What fields are required in the enrollment form?
Answer: Typically ( name- student ID- reason) for enrollment > Check the form for specifics.

Question: What if I don’t get an enrollment confirmation?
Answer: Check Notifications or ask the admin via Chatbot for your status.

Question: How do I access files for a course I’m enrolled in?
Answer: After enrollment approval > go to Files in the sidebar or click View Files on the course’s details page.

Question: Can I download enrollment-related files?
Answer: Yes  on the Files page> filter by course and click Download next to each file.

Question: As an admin how do I upload files for enrolled students?
Answer: On the course’s details or Files page > click Upload to add files (e.g syllabus) for enrolled students.

Question: What if no files show for my enrolled course?
Answer: The admin hasn’t uploaded files > Check Announcements or ask via Chatbot.

Question: How do I filter files for a specific enrolled course?
Answer: On the Files page and use the course dropdown to select your enrolled course.

Question: As an admin can I delete files for enrolled students?
Answer: Yes on the Files page and select a file and delete it > removing access for students.

Question: What if a file download fails after enrollment?
Answer: Check your internet or try another browser > Report via Chatbot if it persists.

Question: Are there files required for enrollment?
Answer: Some courses may require uploads (e.g ID proof) in the enrollment form > check course details.

Question: How do I know if new files are added post-enrollment?
Answer: Check Notifications or the Files page for updates from your course.

Question: As an admin how do I restrict files to enrolled students?
Answer: Upload files to a specific course on the Files or course details page to limit access.

Question: What types of files can I download?
Answer: Likely (PDFs –  docs  - slides) download to view > Check course details for specifics.

Question: What if I can’t find files for my enrolled course?
Answer: Ensure you’re filtering by the correct course > If none exist so  ask the admin via Chatbot.

Question: How do I check my enrollment status?
Answer: Click Notifications in the sidebar to see updates on approval or rejection.

Question: What types of enrollment notifications will I get?
Answer: Updates on form (submissions – approvals- rejections or new files) for enrolled courses.

Question: As an admin how do I send enrollment notifications?
Answer: Approve or reject submissions on the Courses page( notifications) are sent automatically.

Question: How do I mark an enrollment notification as read?
Answer: On the Notifications page > click the notification to mark it as read.

Question: What if I don’t see my enrollment notification?
Answer: Check the Notifications page or ask the admin via Chatbot for status.

Question: As an admin  what enrollment notifications do I get?
Answer: Alerts for pending submissions or enrollment issues > Check Notifications or Courses.

Question: Can I mark all enrollment notifications as read?
Answer: Look for a “Mark All Read” button on the Notifications page.

Question: What if notifications don’t load?
Answer: Refresh the page or log out/in > Use Chatbot to report issues.

Question: How do I know a notification is enrollment-related?
Answer: It will mention the course name or terms like “enrollment” or “approved.”

Question: What if I miss an enrollment rejection notice?
Answer: Check Notifications they persist until marked read >Ask via Chatbot if needed.

Question: How do I ask about an enrollment issue?
Answer: Click Chatbot in the sidebar and type your issue > e.g “Why was my enrollment rejected?”.

Question: As an admin can I use the Chatbot for enrollment tasks?
Answer: Yes ask about managing submissions >creating courses or troubleshooting enrollment.

Question: Can the Chatbot check my enrollment status?
Answer: Yes describe the course and it may guide you to Notifications or query the admin.

Question: What if the Chatbot can’t resolve my enrollment question?
Answer: It will suggest next steps like contacting an admin directly.

Question: Is the Chatbot available for enrollment questions 24/7?
Answer: Yes it’s AI-based and always accessible via the sidebar.

Question: Can I ask the Chatbot about enrollment form fields?
Answer: Yes it can clarify fields like (name - student ID -  reason )for enrollment.

Question: How do I access the Chatbot for enrollment help?
Answer: Click Chatbot in the sidebar for all enrollment-related queries.

Question: How do I update my phone number for enrollment?
Answer: Click Profile in the sidebar > click Edit next to phone number > update and Save.

Question: How do I change my password to secure enrollment access?
Answer: On Profile > click Change Password and  enter old and new passwords then confirm.

Question: How do I manage enrollment notifications?
Answer: Click Manage Notifications on Profile to toggle alerts for enrollment updates.

Question: As an admin are there enrollment settings in Profile?
Answer: Yes  you may see options for managing course permissions or notifications.

Question: What if my profile changes don’t save for enrollment?
Answer: Ensure fields are valid > Try again or ask via Chatbot.

Question: Can I update my student ID for enrollment forms?
Answer: Not mentioned phone and password are editable > Ask admin via Chatbot for ID changes.

Question: How do enrollment notifications work with Profile settings?
Answer: Toggle settings in Manage Notifications to receive email or site alerts for enrollment.

Question: How do I log out after enrolling in a course?
Answer: Click Logout in the sidebar to end your session.

Question: Does logging out affect my enrollment status?
Answer: No your enrollment remains active > Log back in to check.

Question: As an admin will logout stop my enrollment reviews?
Answer: No pending reviews stay in the system > Log in to continue.

Question: What happens after I log out?
Answer: You’re redirected to the login page > Use the header to log in again for enrollment tasks.

Question: How do I enroll in a course?
Answer: Click Courses in the sidebar then select a course> click View Details and then click Enroll > Fill out the form (name -  student ID -  reason for enrollment) and submit.
